formdata.description: email addresses separated by comma of the user for which you want to change the password
PERMANENT or TEMPORARY. If temporary, then user will login using your changed password and Cognito will ask user to setup a new password

request.description:
This allows an Occy Admin to change the password for any user

Only super admins can access this route
This API sends a parsing request to Lens server and expects an XML in return with parsed data from the resume file

response.name: Lens Client API - Parsing Request
response.body:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<ResDoc>
    <resume xml:space="preserve" canonversion="2" dateversion="2" present="739109" iso8601="2024-08-09">
        <contact>
            <name>
                <givenname>CAMERON</givenname>
                <surname>WHITEHEAD</surname>
            </name>
            <phone type="cell">07867472824</phone>
            <email>CameronWhitehead@dayrep.com</email>
        </contact>

        
TEST_CV_WITH_DUMMY_DATA
        <statements>PERSONAL STATEMENT


            <personal>I am a physically fit, practical person who is keen to find full time employment. I enjoy working with people and I am willing to try my hand at anything. I am bright and happy to learn new skills to further my career prospects.

SKILLS
 
Good communication skills

                <license>Have a driving license</license> and own transport
Level qualification 2 in Sport
            </personal>
        </statements>

        <skills>Computer skills 

            <description>Hard working
Friendly
Customer service knowledge
Mature
Strong sales experience
Keen to progress
Confident in speaking to different people at all levels</description>
        </skills>
        <experience start="734505" end="present">EMPLOYMENT


            <job start="737121" end="present" pos="1" span="5" id="1">
                <daterange>
                    <start days="737121" iso8601="2019-03-01">March 2019</start> -
                    <end days="present" iso8601="2024-08-09">Present</end>
                </daterange>
                <employer>Parkdean Resorts</employer>
                <title>Security Assistant</title>
                <description>At Parkdean Resorts I worked at Coopers Beach Holiday Park. As a security assistant to the park I was responsible for not only our owners on the caravan park but holiday makers too, delivering exceptional customer service all round the clock. We provided this by meeting evry need to customer when all other staff had gone home, weather it was security, maintenance or housekeeping duties., this was also carried on the entertainment complex, looking after customers welfare as well as dealing with altercations between customers. Closing down at the end of the night in the complex, patrols of the park too maintaining a security presents.</description>
            </job>
            <job start="736940" end="737121" pos="2" span="0" id="2">
                <daterange>
                    <start days="736940" iso8601="2018-09-01">September 2018</start> -
                    <end days="737121" iso8601="2019-03-01">March 2019</end>
                </daterange>
                <employer>APG SECURITY SOLUTIONS</employer>
                <title>Security officer</title>

At
                <description>APG I worked as a security officer for various clients in retail, corporate and events, I used my skills to;
Act as a deterrent to shoplifters
CCTV surveillance 
Crowd control and management
Ejecting from the premises for various reasons
Liasing with emergency serviices
Rapid response duties</description>
            </job>
            <job start="736118" end="736940" pos="3" span="2" sic="80100" sic2="80" id="3">
                <daterange>
                    <start days="736118" iso8601="2016-06-01">June 2016</start> -
                    <end days="736940" iso8601="2018-09-01">September 2018</end>
                </daterange> -
                <employer>Regency Security Services</employer>
                <title>Door supervisor</title>

                <description>Checking identification
Crowd management 
Protection and safety of the public
Writing incident reports
Searching
Liaising with the police and other emergency services</description>
            </job>
            <job start="735874" end="736118" pos="4" span="1" id="4">
                <daterange>
                    <start days="735874" iso8601="2015-10-01">October 2015</start> -
                    <end days="736118" iso8601="2016-06-01">june 2016</end>
                </daterange> -
                <employer>Doorsec security solutions</employer>
                <title>Door supervisor</title>


                <description>Checking identification. 
Controlling crow
Protection and safety of the public
Writing incident reports when needed
Patrolling around the venue.
Liaising with the police.
 Searching
Assisting vulnerable people.</description>
            </job>
            <job start="735417" end="735509" pos="6" span="0" id="5">
                <daterange>
                    <start days="735417" iso8601="2014-07-01">July</start> -
                    <end days="735509" iso8601="2014-10-01">October 2014</end>
                </daterange> -
                <employer>Helms UK</employer>
                <title>Marketing Manager</title> 


                <description>Responsible for managing two types of marketing,  telemarking and door canvassing
Helping my recruitment officer build my marking department
Had a variety of people working under me to help run there teams in both types of marketing
Able to hit targets given as well as hitting new records as a branch</description>
            </job>
            <job start="734505" end="735691" pos="5" span="3" sic="7487" sic2="74" id="6">
                <daterange>

                <title>Marketing manager</title>

                <description>Gained more customer service skills. 
Extremely confident at now talking to costumers. 
Manager in a team or telephone and door to door canvassers. 
Meeting targets, also going beyond targets set on a day to day business.

Also helping with recruitment to expand our team on a weekly basis.</description>
            </job>  




6 months - Door
            <job id="7">
                <title>Canvasser</title>
                <description>Daily basis out on the field all over Essex interactive with people or all ages
Gained a lot of confidence talking to complete strangers in this job
Communication skills
After 3 months I was then team leader, shortly after I was temporary door canvasser manager I brought new employers in and my team grew. 

18 months - Telemarketing 
Gained a lot of costumer service and care skills
Dealing with existing customers
Cold calling to bring in new potential costumers into the business
Promoted to telemarking manager
Trained and retained all my staff to the level they needed to be to hit given targets on a daily and weekly basis 
After 3 months and with the help of my team we achieved a new branch record
Incentive setting
I loved the atmosphere and the people I worked with</description>
